alert.note: Alert for Daviess; Henderson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 01 at 8:47PM EDT until August 01 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL HENDERSON AND SOUTHWESTERN DAVIESS COUNTIES... At 746 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near St. Joseph, or 10 miles west of Owensboro, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Owensboro around 750 PM CDT. Masonville around 805 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Moseleyville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 165 between Mile Markers 66 and 68. Audubon Parkway between Mile Markers 12 and 23. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
